title: B.R.E.W.S. VAT
content:
The B.R.E.W.S. Vat – B.R.E.W.S being shorthand for Bone Reinforcing, Enhancing, and Whitening Solution – is a machine used to brew bones. The vat can be filled with up to six bones per use before lowering them into the solution with the B.R.E.W.S. Lever.

After preparing the bones, they can then be used by the Bonewright to create shields and weaponry.
